entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow early this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 16.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 16. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 60 in the evening then light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
